Articles.Content:
I reached the north pole!

(I also found a weird bug with the camera angles when my Kerbal was standing on the North pole, so I don't know if this should be placed in the fan works or the bug section)

Mod in the window on the left: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbal-alarm-clock-2/

Victim/Volunteer: Seanrey Kerman

Edited April 20, 2014 by pauldbk99
This is a well documented glitch resulting from glitches in the terrain mapping. The devs know about it, its just not important enough to deal with the headache of fixing it.
Nice! What did you do to pass the time while driving?

Nice! What did you do to pass the time while driving?

The drive was not that long because I launched the rover on a rocket to a spot very close to the

North pole
